Uses of Package
com.joliciel.talismane.machineLearning

  • Packages that use com.joliciel.talismane.machineLearning 
    Package Description
    com.joliciel.talismane
    Entry-point package for Talismane - for simple usage code samples, see the com.joliciel.talismane.examples package.
    com.joliciel.talismane.languageDetector
    A package for training a language detector, based on a set of corpora, one per language, with one sentence per line.
    com.joliciel.talismane.machineLearning
    Top-level package for machine-learning.
    com.joliciel.talismane.machineLearning.features
    Generic features for use with Talismane machine learning, enabling various logical, mathematical and string manipulation functions in these features.
    com.joliciel.talismane.machineLearning.linearsvm
    Linear SVM implementation for machine learning, wrapping liblinear-java.
    com.joliciel.talismane.machineLearning.maxent
    Maximum entropy implementation for machine learning, wrapping OpenNLP MaxEnt.
    com.joliciel.talismane.machineLearning.perceptron
    Perceptron implementation for machine learning.
    com.joliciel.talismane.parser
    Transition-based dependency parsing ( Parser), evaluation ( ParserEvaluator), and output artefacts (ParseConfiguration, DependencyNode).
    com.joliciel.talismane.posTagger
    Package enabling the part-of-speech tagging of a TokenSequence.
    The central class is the PosTagger.
    com.joliciel.talismane.sentenceDetector
    Training and evaluation for sentence detectors.
    com.joliciel.talismane.tokeniser
    Tokenisation package.
    com.joliciel.talismane.tokeniser.patterns
    A package for the pattern based tokeniser, which applies supervised machine learning to certain patterns in the text representing ambiguous tokenisation decisions.
  • Classes in com.joliciel.talismane.machineLearning used by com.joliciel.talismane 
    Class and Description
    ExternalResourceFinder
    Finds the external resource corresponding to a given name.
  • Classes in com.joliciel.talismane.machineLearning used by com.joliciel.talismane.languageDetector 
    Class and Description
    ClassificationEvent
    A single classification event in a training or test corpus, combining the results of feature tests and the correct classification.
    ClassificationEventStream
    An interface for reading corpus classification events from a training or test corpus.
    ClassificationModel
    A machine learning model for classification.
    DecisionMaker
    Makes probabilised decisions based on feature results.
  • Classes in com.joliciel.talismane.machineLearning used by com.joliciel.talismane.machineLearning 
    Class and Description
    ClassificationEvent
    A single classification event in a training or test corpus, combining the results of feature tests and the correct classification.
    ClassificationEventStream
    An interface for reading corpus classification events from a training or test corpus.
    ClassificationModel
    A machine learning model for classification.
    ClassificationModelTrainer
    Trains a machine learning classification model for a given CorpusEventStream.
    ClassificationObserver
    Makes it possible to observe the decision making procedure for a given analyser.
    ClassificationSolution
    A solution to a particular classification problem.
    Decision
    A single probabilised decision used to construct a particular solution.
    DecisionMaker
    Makes probabilised decisions based on feature results.
    ExternalResource
    An external resource which returns something (T) matching a list of key elements.
    ExternalResourceFinder
    Finds the external resource corresponding to a given name.
    MachineLearningAlgorithm
    Machine learning algorithms supported by Talismane.
    MachineLearningModel
    A machine learning model, capable of providing a DecisionMaker, and encapsluating all of the information required to analyse mew data (e.g.
    ScoringStrategy
    A strategy for scoring a given solution, in view of the decisions made and the underlying solutions.
    Solution
